nodes.text: Meg Cabot is an author who penned "Beru Whitesun Lars," one of the forty short stories featured in the anthology From a Certain Point of View. The piece centers around the posthumous musings of the titular aunt of Luke Skywalker after her death during the events of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. Cabot is a renowned children's author who is well known for her series The Princess Diaries and has also authored numerous other titles.
